metadata.raw:
SIE Behemoth Class Bulk Gas Transport (Civilian Starship)

The SIE Behemoth class bulk carrier is designed for the transport of cryogenic gases. Its cargo capacity of 7288 tons consists of 7*1000 ton pressure vessels around a central spine, and a small pressurized cargo bay maintained at normal environmental conditions displacing the remaining 288 tons.

CraftID: Behemoth Bulk Carrier, TL15, MCr1537.52
Hull: 9000/22500, Disp=10000, Config=7USL, Armor=40G, Unloaded=18589t, Loaded=118,809t
Power: 54/108, Fusion=14,400MW, Dur=30 days
Loco: 180/360, Maneuver=1, 270/540, Jump=2, Agility=4
Comm: Radio=System
Sensors: EMS Active(Planetary), EMS Passive(Substellar), ActObjScan=Diff, ActObjPin=Diff, PassEnScan=Rout
Off: 
Hardpoints=100
          No Weapons Mounted
Def: 
DefDM+9
Control: Computer Mod6*3, 1*LargeHoloDisplay, 4*HeadsUpDisplay, 1800*Hololink
Accom: Crew=22 (3 command, 7 bridge, 10 engineer, 1 maintenance, 1 medic), 22*Staterooms, Env=basic env, basic ls, extended ls
Other: Fuel=26,000kl, Cargo=98,400kl (7288t), ObjSize=Large, EmLevel=Moderate

Author: R.S.Dean
